contentSecurityPolicy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data:; connect-src 'self'; frame-src 'none'; font-src 'self'; object-src 'none'; media-src 'none'; frame-ancestors 'none'; base-uri 'none'; form-action 'self'; manifest-src 'self'; worker-src 'self'; prefetch-src 'self'; child-src 'self'; script-src-attr 'none'; style-src-attr 'none'; plugin-types 'none'; block-all-mixed-content; upgrade-insecure-requests; report-uri /csp-report
